arts.ttl: The Celtic star in Brendan Rodgers' crosshairs from raging St Johnstone 'mentality' tirade
arts.sum: Rodgers made his feelings on his side's showing in Perth very clear as the Hoops fell to just their third league defeat of the season against the Saints

arts.ttl: Magic Sam Dalby leaves Jim Goodwin in Dundee Utd disbelief as hitman backed to hilt to gun down Maeda and Murray
arts.sum: Dalby is in a three-way battle with Daizen Maeda and Simon Murray for the top scorer gong

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou lets rip at VAR AGAIN as infamous Celtic 'gymnastics' rant echoes through his Tottenham rage
arts.sum: Postecoglou has made it no secret he's unhappy with the tech

arts.ttl: Bobby Petta says Chris Sutton has done something he once told Celtic players he'd never do
arts.sum: Bobby Petta, who enjoyed the Celtic Park dressing room with Sutton, shared an interesting insight into the striker-turned-pundit and what he once told the players he would never do. When speaking on the Warm-Up, Petta explained how his former teammate once told the Celtic players ‘I am never going on TV’.

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers took deep Celtic breath and asked himself a difficult question in moment of solitude on pitch in Perth
arts.sum: Rodgers wasn't a happy man and admitted he had to swallow some of his 'anger' at full-time

arts.ttl: 'I've seen a trend now' - Rodgers bemoans Celtic start as title party delayed
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers bemoans how Celtic have started recent games his side's expected title party is delayed after losing to St Johnstone

arts.ttl: Celtic Q+A: Brendan Rodgers' stern message to players after defeat vs St Johnstone
arts.sum: Everything Brendan Rodgers said to the media after watching his Celtic side fall to a 1-0 defeat at the hands of St Johnstone.
